entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except calm over exposed coastal sections early this afternoon. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023
